name: Space go brrr
description:
Thank you for checking my game out! This is just a simple 2d space shooter game with some silly vibes added to it. I hope you enjoy!

To the Sparkle of the Stars,

FroggyOverlord

Modifications

  1. Updated sound design
  2. Reskinned Player
  3. Recolored out of game menu and added additional text
  4. Added instructions
  5. Added new background to main menu and final level 
  6. Recolored background for level 1 and 2
  7. Added enemy spawners
